question: Your internet connection has been slow and intermittent Write a letter to your internet service provider to complain about. In the letter: – Describe the problem and why you are unhappy – Arrange for an engineer to visit your home – Request a reduction in your bill
text: Recently, the internet connection at my home has been slow and intermittent. It is frequently cut off the connection so it is really not convenient for me to work from home all day. The worst case is sometimes it seems to be down for about an hour.

Due to that, I have been keeping in touch with your team but till now the issue is still persistent. Could you please arrange for an engineer to visit my home in order to resolve the issue again? As I have been encountering this persistent disconnection issue, I also would like to request a reduction in my coming bill.
Please assist to arrange a visit and take a look at my bill. Looking forwards to your reply soon.
